name: Spherical Saunter M
description:
Inspired by legends like Kororinpa, Marble Blast, and Super Monkey Ball, Spherical Saunter M has you tilting the world to guide a ball to the end of varied levels.

Play alone or race against a friend!

Now featuring six different unique models to roll around -- each with a unique set of leaderboards. Try the hyper-fast triangular pyramid, or race your friend as the cumbersome couch!
